headline: Ask HN: Why Did the Original Slack Post Fall Off the Front Page?
description:
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428142 was there originally, gained steam

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428788 then seemed to replace it

And the second post is only 2nd position, though it's clearly hugely impactful

What's going on that the algorithm downshifts the original and 2nd places the replacement?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么最初的Slack帖子会从头版上掉下来？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼最初的Slack帖子會從頭版上掉下來？
description_zh-Hans:
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428142 原本在那里，获得了人气

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428788，然后似乎取代了它

而第二篇文章只在第二位，尽管它显然具有巨大的影响力

是什么原因使算法降低了原来的位置，而将替代者放在第二位？
description_zh-Hant:
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428142 原本在那裡，獲得了人氣

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428788，然後似乎取代了它

而第二篇文章只在第二位，儘管它顯然具有巨大的影響力

是什麼原因使算法降低了原來的位置，而將替代者放在第二位？
